# stem

**Instance Property**

The non-extension portion of this file or directory  component.

## Declaration

```swift
var stem: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Examples:

- `foo.txt => foo`
- `foo.tar.gz => foo.tar`
- `Foo.app => Foo`
- `.hidden => .hidden`
- `..      => ..`
title: stem
